articles.title: ‘Devastating’: Cricket icon dead at 37
articles.description: Zimbabwe cricket coach Sinikiwe Mpofu has died aged 37.
articles.content:
Zimbabwe cricket coach Sinikiwe Mpofu has died aged 37.
The national women’s assistant coach’s passing comes less than a month after the death of her husband Shepherd Makunura.

articles.content:
